task.phase: Phase 3: API Design with Builder Pattern
task.description: Implement HtmlToPdfConverter that takes HTML string content and generates PDF using the builder API and CDP client.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Loads HTML content in Chrome using CDP
Returns byte array with PDF data
Integration tests with actual HTML content

implementation-notes.note: Implementation approach: 1. Navigate to "about:blank" 2. Use Page.setDocumentContent() to load HTML 3. Wait for DOMContentLoaded event 4. Call Page.printToPDF() with options 5. Decode base64 PDF data 6. Return byte array
Alternative: Use data URI: Page.navigate("data:text/html," + encodedHtml)
Handle CDP exceptions and wrap in PdfGenerationException
Support large HTML content (check size limits)

testing-requirements.requirement: Unit tests with mocked CDP client
Integration test with complex HTML (images, CSS)
Test error handling for invalid HTML
